post6.title: Transforming Dalí
post6.content: This image was found on Pinterest! . Source | . For my first introduction to data science, we reconstructed a black and white image into a colored one. We took Jason Antic's De-Oldify code which is a deep learning based project for restoring old images. In case you're not familiar with deep learning, it is a field within machine learning which mimics the human brain. Deep learning is the creation of a multi neural network architecture that is trained with millions of data points. This exercise demonstrates a fantastic application of the power of using deep learning. . Dalí . The caption for this image is "Dalí dans l'eau, Port-Lligat (Jean Dieuzaide, 1953)" which translates to Dalí in the water, Port-Lligat. I'd say that the colorization has been done very well. The water is a beautiful blue - typical of what you would find in the Mediterranean Sea. I wonder if the flowers were actually this soft pink color. .
